title: Inflationary gap and the Phillips curve

content.question:
Use the graph below of a long-run Phillips Curve <math alttext="open parenthesis, L R P C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext></mtext><mtext>LRPC</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and a short-run Phillips Curve <math alttext="open parenthesis, S R P C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>SRPC</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> to answer the question.

Which of the following points illustrates an inflationary gap?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
